> What the meaning of "Surt Prefixed" in Heritrix Document?

SURT is a way =
of rewriting a URL so that it is sortable, and if you
can correctly sort a =
URL it's faster to index, and perform look ups
for matching URL(s). Softwar=
e can quickly find all the URL(s) that
belong to the cnn.com domain, or yah=
oo.com domain as an example.

It's mostly for optimization when working wit=
h large lists of URL(s).
